sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ad( adindex, userid, name, service, ment, email, phone ) VALUES ( ad_seq.nextval, '$userid$', '$first_name$', '$service_op$', '$ment$', '$email$', '$phone$' )
sqlMap.select: SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* from ( SELECT ADINDEX USERID SERVICE MENT SDATE EDATE RDATE BANNER STATUS EMAIL PHONE NAME FROM AD WHERE ADINDEX IS NOT NULL ORDER BY RDATE DESC) a )b
